00002 from pyre.components.Component import Component

00004 class FourAtomPotential(FourAtomInteraction):
00005     '''representation of a three atom potential for gulp'''
00006     class Inventory(Component.Inventory):
00007         import pyre.inventory as inv
00008         interIntra = inv.str( "Molecularity", default = None)
00009         interIntra.meta['tip'] = "whether the potential is molecular and if so, whether it is between or within molecules"
00010         interIntra.validator = inv.choice([None,'intermolecular','intramolecular'])
00011         bondXsO = inv.str( "Bonded Atom Interactions", default = None)
00012         bondXsO.meta['tip'] = "how the potential acts among bonded atoms"
00013         bondXsO.validator = inv.choice([None,
00014                     'only between bonded atoms',
00015                     'not between bonded atoms',
00016                     'not between bonded atoms or atoms separated by two bonds',
00017                     'only between atoms separated by three bonds'])
00018         atom1 = inv.str('Atom 1',default='H')
00019         atom1.meta['tip'] = 'chemical species of atom 1'
00020         atom1.meta['importance'] = 100
00021         atom2 = inv.str('Atom 2',default='H')
00022         atom2.meta['tip'] = 'chemical species of atom 2'   
00023         atom2.meta['importance'] = 100
00024         atom3 = inv.str('Atom 3',default='H')
00025         atom3.meta['tip'] = 'chemical species of atom 3' 
00026         atom3.meta['importance'] = 100     
00027         atom4 = inv.str('Atom 4',default='H')
00028         atom4.meta['tip'] = 'chemical species of atom 4'  
00029         atom4.meta['importance'] = 100
00030         atom1Type = inv.str( "Atom 1 Type", default = 'core')
00031         atom1Type.meta['tip'] = "type of atom 1"
00032         atom1Type.validator = inv.choice(['core','shell'])
00033         atom1Type.meta['importance'] = 50
00034         atom2Type = inv.str( "Atom 2 Type", default = 'core')
00035         atom2Type.meta['tip'] = "type of atom 2"
00036         atom2Type.validator = inv.choice(['core','shell'])
00037         atom2Type.meta['importance'] = 50
00038         atom3Type = inv.str( "Atom 3 Type", default = 'core')
00039         atom3Type.meta['tip'] = "type of atom 3"
00040         atom3Type.validator = inv.choice(['core','shell'])
00041         atom3Type.meta['importance'] = 50
00042         atom4Type = inv.str( "Atom 4 Type", default = 'core')
00043         atom4Type.meta['tip'] = "type of atom 4"
00044         atom4Type.validator = inv.choice(['core','shell'])
00045         atom4Type.meta['importance'] = 50

00048     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2, atom3, atom4):
00049         FourAtomInteraction.__init__(self, atom1, atom2, atom3, atom4)
00050         self.ii=self.inventory
00051             
00052     def getIfDefined(self, inventoryItem):
00053         if inventoryItem==None:
00054             return ''
00055         else:
00056             return inventoryItem
00057         
00058     def getIfDefinedSpace(self, inventoryItem):
00059         if inventoryItem==None:
00060             return ''
00061         else:
00062             return inventoryItem+' '
00063         
00064     def writeBonding(self):
00065         '''writes bonding options'''
00066         if self.ii.bondXsO==None:
00067             return ''
00068         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='only between bonded atoms':
00069             return 'bond '
00070         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='not between bonded atoms':
00071             return 'x12 '
00072         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='not between bonded atoms or atoms separated by two bonds':
00073             return 'x13 '
00074         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='only between atoms separated by three bonds':
00075             return 'o14 '       
00076             
00077     def writeInterIntra(self):
00078         '''writes molecularity options'''
00079         if self.ii.interIntra==None:
00080             return ''
00081         elif self.ii.interIntra=='intermolecular':
00082             return 'inter '
00083         elif self.ii.interIntra=='intramolecular':
00084             return 'intra '
00085         
00086     def getFlag(self, flagItem):
00087         if flagItem==None:
00088             return ''
00089         else:
00090             if flagItem:
00091                 return '1 '
00092             else:
00093                 return '0 '
